folders.name: Angry
folders.title: Angry mood songs
folders.description: 'Angry Mode' is a high-energy track with intense beats, aggressive guitar riffs, and raw vocals, perfect for channeling and amplifying your rage, offering a powerful and cathartic musical release.

folders.name: CS
folders.title: Copyright songs
folders.description: 'Copyright Song' humorously tackles the complexities of copyright issues with catchy lyrics and a playful melody, making light of legal intricacies while delivering an educational and entertaining musical experience.

folders.name: DeepSleep
folders.title: DeepSleep songs
folders.description: 'DeepSleep' is a calming, soothing track with gentle melodies and serene soundscapes, designed to help you relax and drift into a peaceful, restorative sleep, ideal for unwinding and recharging.

folders.name: Focus
folders.title: Focus Song
folders.description: This is a playlist full of songs which helps you focus better and eventually improves it.

folders.name: Gaming
folders.title: Gaming Song
folders.description: These songs provides you a better experiences while playing game, if you listen to them.

folders.name: Warrior
folders.title: Warrior songs
folders.description: 'Warrior Song' is a powerful anthem with epic melodies, driving percussion, and fierce vocals, designed to inspire strength and determination, perfect for conquering challenges and embracing your inner warrior.
